nodes.title: Learn JavaScript basics
nodes.desc: Understand the fundamentals of JavaScript, including variables, data types, functions, and object-oriented programming. [MDN Web Docs](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Learn/Getting_started_with_the_web/JavaScript_basics)

nodes.title: Understand React core concepts
nodes.desc: Familiarize yourself with React's component-based architecture, JSX, state, props, and the Virtual DOM. [React Official Documentation](https://reactjs.org/docs/getting-started.html)

nodes.title: Practice with React projects
nodes.desc: Build multiple React projects to solidify your understanding of React concepts and to gain practical experience. [GitHub](https://github.com/)

nodes.title: Learn about React best practices
nodes.desc: Understand how to follow best practices for coding, testing, and debugging React applications. [React Official Documentation](https://reactjs.org/docs/optimizing-performance.html)

nodes.title: Stay up-to-date with React
nodes.desc: Follow React blogs, attend conferences, and participate in online communities to stay current with the latest React developments. [React Blog](https://reactjs.org/blog/)

nodes.title: Learn about React testing
nodes.desc: Understand how to write unit tests and integration tests for React components using Jest and Enzyme. [Jest Documentation](https://jestjs.io/docs/en/getting-started)

nodes.title: Learn about React performance optimization
nodes.desc: Understand how to optimize the performance of React applications using techniques such as memoization and shouldComponentUpdate. [React Official Documentation](https://reactjs.org/docs/optimizing-performance.html)

nodes.title: Learn about React security
nodes.desc: Understand how to secure React applications by protecting against common web vulnerabilities such as XSS and CSRF. [OWASP](https://owasp.org/www-project-top-ten/)

nodes.title: Set up a development environment
nodes.desc: Install Node.js, npm, and a code editor, and create a new React project using create-react-app. [Create React App](https://create-react-app.dev/)

nodes.title: Build a simple React app
nodes.desc: Create a basic React application to understand the workflow and component structure. [CodeSandbox](https://codesandbox.io/s/new)

nodes.title: Learn about React components
nodes.desc: Understand the different types of components, such as functional and class components, and learn how to create and use them. [React Official Documentation](https://reactjs.org/docs/components-and-props.html)

nodes.title: Understand state and props
nodes.desc: Learn how to manage state and props in React components, and how to pass data between components. [React Official Documentation](https://reactjs.org/docs/state-and-lifecycle.html)

nodes.title: Learn about React Hooks
nodes.desc: Understand the basics of React Hooks, including useState, useEffect, and useContext, and learn how to use them in functional components. [React Official Documentation](https://reactjs.org/docs/hooks-intro.html)

nodes.title: Build a complex React app
nodes.desc: Create a more complex React application to practice using React concepts, such as state management, routing, and API integration. [FreeCodeCamp](https://www.freecodecamp.org/learn/front-end-development-libraries/react/)

nodes.title: Learn about React Router
nodes.desc: Understand how to use React Router to manage client-side routing in React applications. [React Router Documentation](https://reactrouter.com/web/guides/quick-start)

nodes.title: Learn about Redux
nodes.desc: Understand how to use Redux to manage global state in React applications. [Redux Documentation](https://redux.js.org/introduction/getting-started)
